scripts.cap:init:child: npm run build:child && npx cap init --web-dir=dist-child --config capacitor.config.child.ts
scripts.cap:init:parent: npm run build:parent && npx cap init --web-dir=dist-parent --config capacitor.config.parent.ts
scripts.cap:init:school: npm run build:school && npx cap init --web-dir=dist-school --config capacitor.config.school.ts
scripts.cap:sync:child: npm run build:child && npx cap sync --config capacitor.config.child.ts
scripts.cap:sync:parent: npm run build:parent && npx cap sync --config capacitor.config.parent.ts
scripts.cap:sync:school: npm run build:school && npx cap sync --config capacitor.config.school.ts
scripts.setup:all: npm run build:child && npm run build:parent && npm run build:school
